get.summary: Gets a thumbnail of the specified file

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: Width of the thumbnail

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Height of the thumbnail

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: URL-encoded filename

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

get.summary: Returns the folder tree of the user

parameters.description: The path relative to the user folder

parameters.description: The depth of the tree
